001package io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.hooks;
002
003/**
004 * Specifies the timing for hook execution relative to the test lifecycle.
005 *
006 * <p>Use {@link #BEFORE} to execute a hook before all tests in a class are run,
007 * and {@link #AFTER} to execute a hook after all tests in a class have completed.</p>
008 *
009 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
010 */
011public enum HookExecution {
012
013   /**
014    * Indicates that the hook should run before tests (setup phase).
015    */
016   BEFORE,
017
018   /**
019    * Indicates that the hook should run after tests (teardown phase).
020    */
021   AFTER
022}
